The Jews and the Christians say, ‘We are the children of God and His beloved ones.’ Say, ‘Then why does He punish you for your sins? Those who say, ‘God is the Messiah, the son of Mary,’ are defying the truth. translation: God commands justice, doing good, and generosity towards relatives and He forbids what is shameful, blameworthy, and oppressive. He teaches you, so that you may take heed.
[Prophet], when you recite the Quran, seek God’s protection from the outcast, Satan.

[Prophet], when you recite the Quran, seek God’s protection from the outcast, Satan.
